title: Narendra Modi: Prime Minister of India - Power, Democracy, War & Peace | Lex Fridman Podcast #460

metadata.summary: In this episode of the Lex Fridman Podcast, Lex interviews Narendra Modi, the Prime Minister of India. They discuss a wide range of topics, including Modi's early life, his journey in the Himalayas, and his views on leadership, democracy, and global peace. The conversation delves into India's cultural identity, its role in international relations, and Modi's personal experiences and philosophies. They also touch upon India's stance on the Russia-Ukraine conflict, the importance of education, and the impact of AI.

topClaims.text: India's cultural identity rooted in thousands of years of Vedic tradition influences global perceptions of peace and conflict.
Narendra Modi claims that criticism is the soul of Democracy.
Narendra Modi won epic-scale elections for Prime Minister three times.
India can play a crucial peacemaking role in the Russia-Ukraine conflict by encouraging both nations to negotiate.
India's democracy serves as a beautiful case study due to its engagement of 900 million voters.

topQuotes.text: My strength lies not in my name, but in the backing of 1.4 billion Indians.
I have a strong belief that criticism is the soul of Democracy.
I'm generally skeptical of Power, money, and fame because of their natural corrupting influence on the Brain, the heart, the soul of a person.
Instead of dreaming about getting and becoming, dream of doing something.
India will neither allow itself to be looked down upon, nor will it ever look up to anyone.

topTopics.description: India's role in global peace and diplomacy

localized.description:
Narendra Modi is the Prime Minister of India. This episode is available in English, Hindi, Russian (and soon other languages). Captions and voice-over audio tracks are provided (for the main episode video on YouTube) in English, Hindi, Russian, and the original mixed-language version, with subtitles available in your preferred language. To listen to the original mixed-language version, please select the Hindi (Latin) audio track. The default is English overdub. To switch between languages on the main episode YouTube video, click: Settings (Gear Icon) ... Audio Track ... Choose Language. 
Thank you for listening ❤ Check out our sponsors: https://lexfridman.com/sponsors/ep460-sb

metadata.shortSummary: Lex Fridman interviews Narendra Modi, the Prime Minister of India, discussing power, democracy, war, peace, and his personal journey.
